help.title: Registration help
help.description:
`------------------------------`
Register your allycode with your discord user for quicker command use
Required: `user`, `allycode`

help.title: Registration help
help.description:
`------------------------------`
Query a player by mention or by allycode
Required: `user`, or `allycode`

help.title: Registration help
help.description:
`------------------------------`
Removes all registered allycodes from your discord user

command.title: Registration %s
command.none:
`------------------------------`
You do not have any registered allycodes
command.updated:
`------------------------------`
Registration has been updated
Your discord has been cleared of all allycodes

error.noAllycodeOrUser: Please provide an allycode and a discord user
